name: Agent Runner UI
description: A UI template for running AI agents on demand with streaming output, file uploads, and integrations support. Designed to connect to the Maestric platform API.

MAESTRIC_API_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of the Maestric platform API (e.g., https://api.maestric.io)

MAESTRIC_API_KEY.description: API key for development/testing. In production, uses cookie/session auth.

branding.description: All brand customization is centralized. Edit tokens.css for colors/typography, brand.config.ts for metadata, and replace logos in public/brand/

exposed_pages.name: Agent Runner
exposed_pages.description: Main agent runner interface with agent picker, file uploads, and streaming output

exposed_pages.name: Run History
exposed_pages.description: View past agent runs and their outputs

api_endpoints.description: This template expects the following Maestric platform API endpoints
endpoints: POST /api/agents/runs - Create a new agent run
GET /api/agents/runs/:id/stream - SSE stream for run output
